author: Special Correspondent
text:
Madurai-bound Pandian Express suffered a delay of for more than four hours after its locomotive failed near Kalpattichathiram in Dindigul district on Thursday morning.

Railway sources said that the AC locomotive failed around 5 a.m.

The train was detained there till an alternative locomotive from Dindigul was taken to the spot. As a result, the superfast train arrived Madurai around 11 a.m.
title: Pandian Express arrives late
